original_title: The Church: Pillar and Ground of the Truth
overview: The church is truly the most glorious thing under heaven, for it is the communion of the saints, the pillar and ground of truth, household of God, and the bride of Christ. Join us as we explore over 2,000 years of church history, from its first-century foundations in Ancient Israel to its global presence today.
tagline: Pillar and Ground of the Truth
title: The Church: Pillar and Ground of the Truth
